about_the_game:
Disclaimer: The VHS effect is not on the trailer BUT it is on the GAME

History

you are a journalist in need of money and you come back to the Play Center years after its sudden closure to make a documentary and make some money again

The Play Center

The play center was once a vibrant and happy place filled with children's laughter and the latest interactive toys. However, a mysterious accident caused its sudden closure. No one knows exactly what happened, but rumors speak of faulty toys spinning out of control and missing children. Since then, the place has fallen into ruins, invaded by dust and silence.

When you arrive, the atmosphere is heavy, the lights flicker irregularly and strange noises echo through the corridors. The toys, once harmless and cheerful, now seem to have sinister life. They move in the shadows, their distorted laughter and jerky movements creating a feeling of anxiety. Some are broken, their limbs hanging oddly, while others are inhabited by an evil force, ready to hunt down the main character.

The player will have to explore this labyrinth of disused game rooms, solve puzzles linked to tragic events of the past, and survive the attack of evil toys. The story could gradually reveal details of the drama, linking the events to an artificial intelligence or supernatural entity that now controls the center and the toys. The deeper the player goes into the heart of the center, the more terrifying the revelations become, and the once innocent toys transform into monstrous creatures.

The ultimate goal: find out what really happened that fateful day and escape this living hell before the toys completely take control.

The Grapplin

  • grappling hook is our weapon, use it to grapple and swing to reach inaccessible places, but be careful when landing

The Laser

  • The Laser is your second weapon use the laser and shoot the targets to open doors

The Mascots

  • But Be Careful The Mascot Are Still Alive And Looking For You, Be careful not to come across them but if she chases you, run
